item.title: Dhoom 2: A robbery car project
item.description: If you’re a millennial kid who grew up loving the first Dhoom movie. You know firsthand how grand the experience was to watch Dhoom 2. The high-tech gadgets, the famous diamond robbery - it was one of the best Bollywood sci-fi tech movies of its time. I was just 10 years old back then. Fast forward to 2026. Twenty years later, I think it’s finally time to build the car replica, to relive the nostalgia and have some fun.
